title: Looking for either an adc to duo with plat + or a team to play with! (Don't mind rank)
body:
Hey! I'm XxAsunaxX and I am looking for either or both a team to play with or a duo :)

I main support and mid, Let me know please! :) Add me :3

replies.body:
Hey you can add me if you want, this is my smurf account. I will be playing on it alot from tonight to get Master on it before end of season. ADC Main.
IGN: Foon
I also have a plat 4 account to get diamond before season ends as well
Hey, can't add you, says your friend list is full.
